name: Save Your Sheep!
description:
Aim: Protect your sheep from the wolves for three days(each day is 2 mins long).

Controls: 

To Move: Up and down arrow keys or W and S

To Shoot: Spacebar

Sheep: https://www.vectorstock.com/royalty-free-vector/cute-sheep-cartoon-character-for...

grass: randomly googled grass sprite that was 100x100 pixels - so who ever you are thank you!

wolf: http://dev.tinytreasures.co.ke/vahoecg2/rpg-sprite-maker.html

Farmer: made in unity

Menu Images: Used Hoth.com logo maker for title and button text

Sound effects: https://freesound.org/people/Bird_man/sounds/275151/ (Forgot to mention in Game Jam Submission.......)
